com.ppm.integration.agilesdk.provider

Interface KpiProvider


  • public interface KpiProvider
    Provider for PPM KPIs information

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Kpi> getAllKpis() 
      Kpi getKpiById(java.lang.Long kpiId)
      Returns the KPI with this id, or null if no such KPI exists.
      Kpi getKpiByName(java.lang.String kpiName)
      Returns the KPI with this name, or null if no such KPI exists.
      KpiValue getLatestKpiValue(java.lang.Long kpiId)
      Returns the latest value captured for a given KPI ID.
      java.util.List<Kpi> searchKpisByName(java.lang.String kpiNameSearchText)
      You can use this method to retrieve all KPIs which names contains the passed text (case insensitive).

    • Method Detail

      • searchKpisByName

        java.util.List<Kpi> searchKpisByName(java.lang.String kpiNameSearchText)
        You can use this method to retrieve all KPIs which names contains the passed text (case insensitive).

      • getKpiByName

        Kpi getKpiByName(java.lang.String kpiName)
        Returns the KPI with this name, or null if no such KPI exists. Since KPI names are unique (case insensitive), this couldn't return more than one result.
        Parameters:
        kpiName - Name of the KPI to retrieve
        Returns:
        the KPI with the passed name (case insensitive), or null if no such KPI exists.

      • getKpiById

        Kpi getKpiById(java.lang.Long kpiId)
        Returns the KPI with this id, or null if no such KPI exists.
        Parameters:
        kpiId - ID of the KPI to retrieve
        Returns:
        the KPI with the passed ID.

      • getLatestKpiValue

        KpiValue getLatestKpiValue(java.lang.Long kpiId)
        Returns the latest value captured for a given KPI ID. The returned KpiValue object contains both the value and the date of the last KPI measure, provided that this date doesn't happens in the future.
        If no KPI value exists, returns null.
        Parameters:
        kpiId - ID of the KPI we want to get the latest value of.
        Returns:
        the latest KPI Value captured for a given KPI.

      • getAllKpis

        java.util.List<Kpi> getAllKpis()
        Returns:
        All the KPIs currently defined in PPM.
